taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans!

taunt.immunity: is decorated for strategic thinking and is not interested in offering a challenge in battle
taunt.text: You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans!

taunt.immunity: is decorated for strategic thinking and is not interested in offering a challenge in battle
taunt.text: You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

taunt.immunity: does not practice the Kralien religion faithfully
taunt.text: Hey wormface! Can I borrow your Holy Scroll of Amborax? I need to wipe my stinky feet!

taunt.immunity: complained to Kralien High Command that Kralien ships are too weak
taunt.text: You call that a warship? I could crush that toy with my bare hands.

taunt.immunity: is unmarried
taunt.text: You're so ugly that your wife will thank me for killing you!

taunt.immunity: openly dislikes the Arvonian Royal Family
taunt.text: Queen Marah looks like a hideous pustule and smells like a flatulent Space Whale.

taunt.immunity: is unmarried
taunt.text: Your husband dresses like a Situlan scum slug!

taunt.immunity: does not care about space whales
taunt.text: I'll kill you later, Arvonian. Right now I'm enjoying a bowl of space whale soup.

taunt.immunity: runs a tidy ship and has no insecurity about hygiene
taunt.text: Do us all a favor and take a bath, you fungus-infested pachyderm!

taunt.immunity: has already mourned his dead father and will not react to taunts about him
taunt.text: Your father is a Space Whale!

taunt.immunity: has the highest Torgoth efficiency rating and will not react to taunts about his ship's condition
taunt.text: That broken down rust bucket guarantees victory for Earth.

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is a flea-bitten Laparian mule!

taunt.immunity: does not care about his ship's appearance
taunt.text: Your ship is so ugly my eyeballs burn just looking at it!

taunt.immunity: often disagrees with Skaraan corporate leadership
taunt.text: Your corporate bosses are dimwitted, money-losing morons!
Scramble signal 1
Scramble signal 2
Scramble signal 3

taunt.immunity: has no visible mutations on his face
taunt.text: The deadliest weapon on your ship is your ugly, mutant face!

taunt.immunity: is a decorated hero who ignores taunts about her bravery
taunt.text: Only a coward hides in a massive battlewagon like that!

taunt.immunity: is a human who has never even seen the Ximni homeworld
taunt.text: The only thing that smells worse than dragon breath is the Ximni home planet!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: isn't familiar with Terran animals
taunt.text: You're nothing but pirhana bait!

taunt.immunity: has a well maintained personal appearance
taunt.text: Your breath could kill a space whale!

taunt.immunity: is proud of his laid back crew with lax discipline
taunt.text: Your crew is a sloppy bunch of disrespectful layabouts!

taunt.immunity: has no living family
taunt.text: Your father is so stupid he thinks planets are tiny plans!

taunt.immunity: is decorated for strategic thinking and is not interested in offering a challenge in battle
taunt.text: You chicken-hearted cowards! I've had more challenging battles with a space bug!

taunt.immunity: is an Artist.
taunt.text: You should fire your Ship designer!

taunt.immunity: is a Member of the Aristocracy.
taunt.text: You should go back to your hovel, pleb!

taunt.immunity: obsessively maintains the cleanliness of their vessel.
taunt.text: That ship smells so bad I can smell it through the vacuum of space!

taunt.immunity: is not particularly Xenophobic
taunt.text: You look a little Skaraan around the hoofs.

taunt.immunity: enjoys tea, earl grey, hot.
had his family killed in orbital bombardments
taunt.text: Your Father smells of elderberries!
Virus Package A
Virus Package B
Virus Package C

taunt.immunity: was born and lived in space as a child
taunt.text: We will bombard your homeworld!

taunt.immunity: is a stellar Bio-Artifacer
taunt.text: You made that ship out of WHAT?!

taunt.immunity: is well educated.
taunt.text: You are as stupid as a fruit!

long_desc.text: TSN Artemis Class Light Cruiser.^General purpose patrol vessel of the TSN and first of the Light Cruiser classes to be designed.^2 Standard beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 EMP, 4 PShock.
TSN Scout^Long range scout vessel of the TSN.^1 forward beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 6 homing, 2 mines, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
TSN Battleship^Beam-heavy combat vessel of the TSN.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 5 PShock.
TSN Missile Cruiser^Specialized vessel of the TSN.^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 8 nukes, 20 homing, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 6 PShock.
TSN Dreadnought^Ultimate wartime vessel of the TSN.^3 primary beams^1 main beam cannon^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 nukes, 10 homing, 8 mines, 5 ECM, 4 PShock.
TSN Medium Carrier^Standard carrier of the TSN.^2 primary beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 1 nukes, 6 homing, 4 mines, 2 ECM, 2 PShock.
TSN Mine Layer^Specialized vessel of the TSN. Fast and tough.^1 primary beam^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 10 homing and 25 mines.
TSN Juggernaut^Secret REAL ultimate wartime vessel of the TSN.^2 primary beams^2 main beam cannons^4 Torpedo tubes^Massive stores and 3 fighters.
Ximni Cruiser^Standard vessel of the Ximni.^3 beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Scout^Long range scout vessel of the Ximni.^1 forward beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 6 homing, 2 mines, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
Ximni Missile Cruiser^Specialized vessel of the Ximni.^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 8 nukes, 20 homing, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 6 PShock.
Ximni Battleship^Beam-heavy combat vessel of the Ximni.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 5 PShock.
Ximni Carrier^Standard carrier of the Ximni.^2 forward beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 1 nukes, 6 homing, 4 mines, 2 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Dreadnought^Ultimate wartime vessel of the Ximni.^2 primary beams, long range and fast firing^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 nukes, 10 homing, 8 mines, 5 ECM, 4 PShock.
Pirate Strongbow^Pirate raider.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 12 homing, 2 Mines, 12 ECM, 8 PShock.
Pirate Longbow^Pirate scout.^1 forward beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 1 Mine, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
Pirate Brigantine^Pirate corvette and light carrier.^2 forward beams, 1 rear beam^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 12 homing, 4 Mines, 12 ECM, 8 PShock.

Nemesis Class Interceptor^Combat scout designed for high-speed interception and strafing runs.^2 standard beams, configured for narrow firing arc, longer range, and reduced intensity.^2 low-intensity beams.^1 Torpedo tube with stores for 8 Homing, 2 EMP, 1 Mine, 8 PShock.
TSN Scout, 2239 refit^Long range scout vessel of the TSN.^1 forward beam, networked point defense beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 8 homing, 2 mines, 4 EMPs, 3 PShock.

Ares Class Light Cruiser^Strike cruiser designed to blast foes at point blank range in a single volley.^Triple R.A.M. Ion beam^1 Standard beam, reduced intensity.^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 10 Homing, 2 Nuke, 4 Mine, 4 EMP, 10 PShock.
Valkyrie Class Light Cruiser^Torpedo cruiser designed to engage foes at any range.^2 Standard beams, reduced intensity.^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 18 Homing, 4 Nuke, 3 Mine, 6 EMP, 18 PShock.

Apollo Class Light Cruiser^Assault cruiser designed for sustained close-quarters fighting.^2 heavy beams, configured for close range^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 10 Homing, 1 Nuke, 2 Mine, 6 EMP, 6 PShock.
Allegiance Class Battlecruiser^Advanced battlecruiser designed for long duration patrols^2 Standard beams^1 Heavy beam^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 10 Homing, 2 Nuke, 6 Mine, 4 EMP, 8 PShock.
Discovery Class Science Vessel^A long-range exploration ship. The hull is a Ximni design.^1 close-range, defensive beam.
Patrach-Edwards Necessity Class ^experimental field-modified Hjorden system defence vessel ^with TSN propulsion and ordnance adaptations
TSN Fighter^One rapid-fire beam, 3 homing torpedoes.
TSN Bomber^One rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
TSN Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over short distances.
TSN Long Range Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is designed to move cargo and people over longer distances.
Ximni Fighter^First draft of a Ximni player fighter.^One rapid-fire beam, 3 homing torpedoes.
Ximni Bomber^One rapid-fire beam, 6 homing torpedoes.
Ximni Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Bus.
Ximni Long Range Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Ride.
Pirate Avenger^A pirate's fighter, light and nimble.^One fast-fire beam, 3 homing torpedoes.
Pirate Adventure^A pirate's shuttle.^One fast-fire beam.
Superiority Fighter^High-speed fighter armed with a heavy pulse beam.
Heavy Bomber^Heavily shielded bomber, armed with 12 homing torpedoes.
Displacement: 0.015 kt. Armament: 2 light beams.
Starbase with strong shields. It is armed with a standard base beam, and can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. May need help if attacked.
Civilian Starbase built by a local government. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Command Starbase with very strong shields. It is armed with a base beam and torpedoes, and can manufacture torps at twice the normal rate.
Manufacturing Starbase owned by a large Corporation. It is unarmed, but can build torpedoes at triple speed. Its defense should be a priority.
Research Starbase studying this sector. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes at a reduced rate. Stations need help if attacked.
Kralien Starbase. It has standard shields, and a base beam.
Arvonian Starbase. It has strong shields, a base beam, and carries a complement of 10 fighters.
Torgoth Starbase. It has very powerful shields, a long range base beam, and can fire drones.
Skaraan Starbase. It has powerful shields, and two base beams.
Zero/Micro G industrial facility
Micro G industrial refinery^CAUTION EXTREMELY VOLATILE
TSN Defence Platform
Small shipyard suitable for major repairs, refits and construction of most vessels.
Sensor station and relay. Part of a long range detection network.
Communication relay. Receives and transmits communication messages, or boosts signal in areas with natural or artificial interference.
Bioengineering station with strong shields. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. Stations need help if attacked.
Hjorden civilian starbase with strong shields. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. Stations need help if attacked.
Asteroid base with very strong shields and heavy defense systems.
N'tani fortified Starbase with strong shields and capable weaponry. It can manufacture torpedoes for your ship, if so inclined.
Static defence platform armed with 6 beams in a radial formation and a small QRF launch bay.
Armed multi-purpose Starbase. It has standard shields, and base beams.
Static defence platform armed with 6 beams in a radial formation and a small QRF launch bay.
Security Starbase with strong shields. It is armed with a standard base beam.
Civilian Starbase. It is unarmed, and has very minor manufacturing capability.
Command Starbase with very strong shields. It is armed and has high manufacturing capability.
Manufacturing Starbase. Unarmed with very high manufacturing capacity.
Research Starbase. Unarmed with minor manufacturing capability
Zero/Micro G industrial facility
Micro G industrial refinery
Shipyard suitable for major repairs, refits and construction of most vessels.
Sensor station and relay. Part of a long range detection network.
Communication relay. Receives and transmits communication messages, or boosts signal in areas with natural or artificial interference.
Bioengineering station with strong shields. It is unarmed, but can manufacture torpedoes for your ship. Stations need help if attacked.
Light warship with forward beam weapons. Used to escort Earth's important cargos.
Medium warship with rapid fire beam weapons. Earth's most common system defense vessel, trading FTL Drive for speed and firepower.
An unarmed, long-range exploration ship. The hull is a Ximni design.
An unarmed bulk freighter, slowly moving cheap cargo between the stars.
An unarmed travelling playground of the rich and powerful.
An unarmed transport, filled with light cargo and civilians.
Long range transport. More often seen in the core worlds on regular transport runs.
Gaspode Class Mining Ship. Designed to break up asteroids, then store and transport the valuable ores to a refining facility.
Small police or customs inspection boat, used mainly to inspect ships and run down smugglers.
Fast and manoeuvrable warship with forward beam weapons and medium shields. Used for wartime patrols.
Armoured Supply Ship. Unarmed.
Armoured Supply Ship. Fitted with a weak foward beam to disuade pirates.
Scow for moving... the more unpleasnt things....
Small mobile shipyard suitable for major repairs, and refits of most TSN vessels.
Displacement: 9 kt. Armament: 2 x standard beams. The most common vessel in the known universe.
Displacement: 17 kt. Armament: 2 x rapid-fire beams. Heart of the Kralien fleet.
Displacement: 25 kt. Armament: 2 rapid fire beams, 1 heavy beam. The most dangerous Kralien ship.
Displacement: 9.5 kt. Armament: 2 standard beams, and 2 light drone launchers.Provides long range support for Kralien fleets.
Armoured kralien freighter. Predominatly used as a military supply vessel.
Displacement: 0.015 kt. Armament: 2 light beams.
Displacement: 25 kt. Armament: 4 medium beams. Complement: 4 fighters.
Displacement: 45 kt. Armament: 6 long-range beams. Complement: 6 fighters.
Displacement: 65 kt. Armament: 3 long range beams. 1 Drone Launcher. Complement: 8 fighters.
Displacement: 80 kt. Armament: 6 medium beams, 1 drone launcher.
Displacement: 90 kt. Armament: 4 medium beams, 1 heavy beam, 1 drone launcher.
Displacement: 150 kt. Armament: 10 standard beams, 1 drone launcher
Displacement: 200 kt. Armement: 10 standard beams, 1 drone launcher
Displacement: 40 kt. Armament: 2 medium beams. The Skaraan's lightest warship.
Displacement: 50 kt. Armament: 4 standard beams. Usually travels alone.
Displacement: 70 kt. Armament: 2 super-heavy beams, 1 medium beam. Very dangerous.
Infant stage of BioMech development. Typically docile, occasionally aggressive.
A BioMech in the childhood stage. Will eventually mature into an adult.
Young adult BioMech. This is the most aggressive stage of development. Proceed with caution.
Full grown adult BioMech. Capable of reproduction and communication.
Hjorden system defence vessel.
Passenger liner for the Hjorden. Cruising the galaxy is a favourite pastime
Standard sub-light cargo ship for the Hjorden.
Patrach-Edwards Necessity Class ^experimental field-modified Hjorden system defence vessel ^with TSN propulsion and ordnance adaptations
Imperial fighter. Displacement: 0.015 kt. Armament: 2 light beams.
Imperial Bunker Buster^Armoured strike craft with a miniaturized Triple Ion beam and single torpedo.
Gladiator class frigate.^Displacement: 13Kt
Gallu class cruiser^Displacement: 15Kt
Emu class battleship^Displacement: 20Kt
Nightmare class independent, long-range scout.^Displacement: 11Kt
Imperial Stellar Navy Xenophobe class dreadnought.^Displacement: 33Kt
Displacement: 60Kt. Imperial super dreadnought
USN Experimental Ops Cruiser^Gallu Heavy Cruiser variant, light carrier with secure special weapons sections^2 standard beams with reduced intensity.
Battlecruiser^Gallu Heavy Cruiser variant with high-powered beams and reinforced forward shields^2 forward heavy beams with wide arcs^2 broadside heavy beams with long range.
Command Cruiser^Gallu Heavy Cruiser variant capable of projecting a small fighter force^2 standard beams with reduced intensity.
Interceptor Cruiser^High-speed combat scout derived from the Gallu class cruiser^4 reduced intensity beams geared for extended range or wide arcs.
Torpedo Cruiser^Long-range fire support cruiser^2 standard beams with reduced intensity.
Strike Cruiser^Attack cruiser suited for devastating hit-and-run attacks^3 Close range slow-firing heavy beams and 2 side-mounted gatling beams.
Modified for higher damage but short range operations. Displacement of 1Kt. Highly aggressive.
A Caltron single unit ship. Displacement of 1Kt. Highly aggressive. TSN officers have nicknamed the Caltrons 'The Swarm'.
Three Caltron ships linked in line abreast. Stronger and tougher then each individual ship. Displacement 3Kt
Six Catltron ships linked in a box formation. Significantly stronger and tougher than each individual ship. Displacement 6Kt
Twelve Caltron ships linked in a box formation. Displacement 12Kt^***CAUTION HIGHLY DANGEROUS***
DANGER: Twenty four Caltron Ships. Displacement 24Kt^***DO NOT APPROCH ALONE***
DANGER: forty eight Caltron ships. Displacement 48Kt^***DO NOT APPROCH ALONE***
Displacement: 7 kt. Armament: 2 pulse beams. May also be outfitted with custom modules. Oversized engines have given it manoeuvreing problems.
Displacement: 12 kt. Armament: 2 pulse beams. 1 overcharged pulse beam. Extremely dangerous to unshielded hull. May also be outfitted with custom modules.
This former terran ship has been captured and retrofitted for combat. 2 rapid fire beams, 1 heavy beam and 1 drone launcher.
Solar sail craft. Probably some sort of long range scout craft
Light Ship. Has dual omni-directional beam weapons that seem to be optimised for mining.
Light warship with 2 forward beam weapons.
Heavy warship fitted with 1 grazer and 2 standard beams, Its forward grazer has a recharge time of about 45 seconds
Small transport ship. Capacity estimated at 5Kt
Ximni Light Cruiser^Standard vessel of the Ximni.^3 beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Scout^Long range scout vessel of the Ximni.^1 forward beam^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 6 homing, 2 mines, 2 ECM, 1 PShock.
Ximni Missile Cruiser^Specialized vessel of the Ximni.^4 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 8 nukes, 20 homing, 14 mines, 12 ECM, 6 PShock.
Ximni Battleship^Beam-heavy combat vessel of the Ximni.^4 forward beams^2 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 2 nukes, 8 homing, 6 mines, 4 ECM, 5 PShock.
Ximni Carrier^Standard carrier of the Ximni.^2 forward beams^1 Torpedo tube^Stores for 1 nukes, 6 homing, 4 mines, 2 ECM, 2 PShock.
Ximni Dreadnought^Ultimate wartime vessel of the Ximni.^2 primary beams, long range and fast firing^3 Torpedo tubes^Stores for 4 nukes, 10 homing, 8 mines, 5 ECM, 4 PShock.
Ximni Fighter^One rapid-fire beam.
Ximni Bomber^One heavy beam and one slow, short-range drone launcher.
Ximni Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Bus.
Ximni Long Range Shuttle^Armed only with a small laser, this shuttle is known as the Party Ride.
